snippet.title: Ruby's Trap teaser trailer - New Agent A chapter.
snippet.description:
Ruby's Trap, the new chapter for Agent A: A puzzle in disguise will arrive on the 22nd December 2016 for iOS and Apple TV.

Ruby's Trap picks up where you previously left off with Agent A trapped inside the evil Ruby La Rouge’s underground cell, a mysterious briefcase the only thing left for you to investigate. What has Ruby got in store for you? Can you outsmart Ruby and escape her trap?

If you like escape games you will love Agent A: http://apple.co/AgentA
